description: The island's parliament fails to back a motion calling for legislation on voluntary assisted dying.
title: Manx assisted dying laws debate 'should not be rushed'
title_page: Manx assisted dying laws debate 'should not be rushed' - BBC News
maintext: The debate surrounding whether or not the Isle of Man should have new laws to allow terminally-ill patients the right to choose when to die "should not be rushed", an MHK has said.
